title: COAS expresses grief over Ali Raza Sadpara’s demise
content:
RAWALPINDI, May 27 (APP): Chief of Army Staff (COAS) General Qamar Javed Bajwa on Friday expressed grief on the sad demise of renowned Pakistani Mountaineer Ali Raza Sadpara.
General Qamar Javed Bajwa, #COAS, expresses grief on the sad demise of renowned Pakistani Mountaineer Ali Raza Sadpara. “May Allah Almighty bless the departed soul in eternal peace, Ameen” COAS.
The ISPR Director General shared the condolence message of Army Chief on his official Twitter handle.
“May Allah Almighty bless the departed soul in eternal peace, Ameen,” the COAS said in his message.
